languages.text: "Помыслы Висиря тоже бывали туманны, но я всегда без сомнений следовала слову его. Мне жаль, что сия благодать не досталась тебе, Вени'Хейнрикс".

traits.locale_text: "Помыслы Висиря тоже бывали туманны, но я всегда без сомнений следовала слову его. Мне жаль, что сия благодать не досталась тебе, Вени'Хейнрикс".

languages.text: "The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."
languages.original_text: "Помыслы Висиря тоже бывали туманны, но я всегда без сомнений следовала слову его. Мне жаль, что сия благодать не досталась тебе, Вени'Хейнрикс".

traits.locale_text: "The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."
"The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."
"The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."
"The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."
"The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."
"The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: «Las intenciones del Visir también eran difíciles de comprender, pero siempre seguí su palabra sin albergar dudas en mi corazón. Lamento que no comparta esta bendición, Veni'Heinrix».
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: 「ヴィジールの意図を見極めることも難しかったが、我はいつも心の中では疑念を持たず、その言葉に従っていた。あなたに同じ祝福がなかったことを残念に思います、ハインリックスさん」
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: “宿老的意图很难辨别，但我始终都会毫不怀疑地听从他的指示。你没有得到同样的祝福，我为此感到遗憾，帷者海因里希。”
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: "Die Absichten des Wesirs waren schwer zu erkennen, aber ich bin seinem Wort stets ohne einen Zweifel im Herzen gefolgt. Es tut mir leid, dass Ihr diesen Segen nicht erfahren habt, Veni'Heinrix."
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: « Les intentions du vizir n'ont jamais été des plus évidentes, mais pour autant, j'ai toujours suivi sa parole sans la remettre en doute. Je regrette qu'il n'en soit pas de même pour vous, Veni'Heinrix. »
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."
"The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."

languages.text: "Vezir'in niyetini de algılamak güçtü. Ancak zihnimde en ufak bir kuşku barındırmadan hep onun sözünü dinledim. Aynı lütfa erişemediğin için üzgünüm Veni'Heinrix."
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier's intentions were also difficult to discern, but I always followed his word without a doubt in my heart. I am sorry that this same blessing did not fall to you, Veni'Heinrix."
